item.title: Introducing a GCP Pub/Sub Message Framework
item.description:
Everything in either in GCP or AWS these days and there is so much data from so many sources!

To try to make sense of all the logs from different sources on GCP pub/sub, I created this little serverless framework that uses Kafka streams for alerting correlation on Kubernetes â€¦
